videoSnippet.title: Armageddon Game for $20.000.00 | Navara vs Wei Yi
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator Chinese rising star Wei Yi is playing a 4-game classical match against Czech no. 1 David Navara in Yancheng, China from 31 December 2017-3 January 2018. The winner gets $20,000, the loser $10,000. The time control is 90 minutes for 40 moves then 30 minutes to the end of the game, with a 30-second increment from move 1. If the match is drawn the players play two 5+3 playoff games and potentially one 6 vs. 5 Armageddon game.

Wei Yi vs David Navara
Armageddon game, Yancheng, China, 2017, Jan-3 
Petrov's Defense: Classical Attack (C42)

1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6 3. Nxe5 d6 4. Nf3 Nxe4 5. d4 d5 6. Bd3 Bf5 7. O-O Be7 8. c4 dxc4 9. Bxc4 O-O 10. Nc3 Nc6 11. Re1 Nxc3 12. bxc3 Bd6 13. Ng5 h6 14. Qf3 Qd7 15. Ne4 Rae8 16. Bd2 Bg4 17. Qd3 Bf5 18. Bb3 Re7 19. g4 Bh7 20. Qf3 Rfe8 21. Nxd6 cxd6 22. Rxe7 Rxe7 23. Bd5 Nd8 24. g5 hxg5 25. Bxg5 Re8 26. Bxd8 Rxd8 27. Bxb7 d5 28. Ba6 Re8 29. Bd3 Bxd3 30. Qxd3 Qg4+ 31. Kh1 Re2 32. Rg1 Qe6 33. Qg3 g6 34. a4 Kg7 35. Qf3 Rc2 36. h4 a6 37. h5 Rxf2 38. h6+ Kh7 39. Qxf2 Qh3+ 40. Qh2 Qf3+ 41. Rg2 Qd1+ 42. Qg1 Qh5+ 43. Rh2 Qf3+ 44. Qg2 Qd1+ 45. Qg1
